title: Sri Lanka squad for Tour of Bangladesh announced
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket on Wednesday (4) announced an 18-member National Squad that will take part in the upcoming Sri Lanka Tour of Bangladesh 2022.
